column1: # Available Blunt-Cutting Restriction Enzymes for Knockout Construct Design
#   2. Do NOT cut any of the cloning vectors (pR-B, pR-H, pR-N, pR-Z)
# Format: Enzyme_Name <tab> Recognition_Sequence <tab> Cost_Tier <tab> NEB_Price <tab> NEB_Units <tab> Notes
# Recognition sequence uses ⇅ to mark cut site
# Cost tiers based on cost per unit:
# NEB_Price: Price in USD for the catalog size
# NEB_Units: Number of units in the catalog size
# Lines starting with # are comments and will be ignored
#   R = A or G    Y = C or T    M = A or C    K = G or T
#   S = G or C    W = A or T    N = any base
# Cost per unit = NEB_Price / NEB_Units (lower is better for prioritization)
